title: Decode issue: seems the decode cannot work properly sometimes
body:
Hi,
 I have a encoded string, basically, this is a valid string and I can decode it using Java or Nodejs correctly. When I decode it using golang, it will throw an error saying "illegal base64 data at input byte 368", the sample code is here: http://play.golang.org/p/InjN-Fr3gO  

Notes: If I add an character "=" , it will decode it correctly and the result is expected. This should be a bug for Golang decoding feature. Hope it can be fixed.

Thanks,
Xiaofei
